meta.title: AiSweet的个人博客
meta.description: 印堂黑过了乌鸦，流世的想法经过。婆娑过了百家，过隙恍恍半世多。
meta.author: AiSweet

posts.title: test3
posts.text: 代码块测试123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627from PIL import ImageGrabfrom PIL import ImageChopsfrom PIL import ImageTkfrom tkinter import *def diffimg(): a = (437,426,913,782) b =(437+571,426,913+571,782) image1 = ImageGrab.grab(a) image2 = ImageGrab.grab(b) diff = ImageChops.difference(image1,image2) return diff def workimg(): r = Toplevel() diff = diffimg() img = ImageTk.PhotoImage(diff) label_img = Label(r,image=img) label_img.pack() r.wm_attributes('-topmost',1) r.mainloop()# root = Tk()# theButton1 = Button(root, text="换图",width=20,height=3,command=workimg)# theButton1.pack()# root.wm_attributes('-topmost',1)# root.mainloop()

posts.title: 我的第二篇博客
posts.text: SOMETHINGI’m a handsome man kind comfort clever charm hesitate You konw who i amwhich you can never get it and come after

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
